subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka dominated a mostly overmatched lineup, earning his first major league shutout as the Yankees halted a six-game losing streak against the Mets with a victory at Citi Field.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka dominated a mostly overmatched lineup, earning his first major league shutout as the Yankees halted a six-game losing streak against the Mets with a victory at Citi Field.
